name: sql92-json
description: can stringify a JSON into an SQL and viceversa parse an SQL and serialize it into a JSON

scripts.build: npm run jekyll; npm run browserify; npm run minify
scripts.coverage: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.docs:_data: for x in package.json tags.json; do npm run docs:_data:$x; done
scripts.homepage:
echo "---
title: $npm_package_name
---" > docs/index.md; cat README.md >> docs/index.md
scripts.minify: cd dist; uglifyjs ${npm_package_name}.js --source-map --output ${npm_package_name}.min.js --compress --mangle -b beautify=false,preamble='"// http://g14n.info/SQL92-JSON"'; cd -
scripts.prejekyll: npm run homepage; npm run docs:_data
scripts.postbuild: git add dist/ docs/; git commit -n -m 'build'; git push origin master
scripts.postversion: git push origin v${npm_package_version}; npm publish; git push origin master
